name: Jordan Mitchell
persona: Jordan is a 21-year-old Business Administration student with a CGPA of 2.71. They are moderately conscientious and show steady perseverance, often putting in consistent effort even when faced with setbacks. While Jordan is fairly confident in their academic abilities and rarely struggles with test anxiety, they sometimes find it challenging to maintain high motivation and self-discipline throughout the semester. Jordan is motivated to improve their grades and is working on building better study habits to reach their academic goals.
